Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Conservatory. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Conservatory.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
